sect1.title: Requesting Support
sect1.para: If you experience any issues with WebRadar or have any questions, please contact Ephox WebRadar Support.

sect2.title: Capturing Logs
sect2.para: When lodging a support case you may be asked to provide logs generated by WebRadar. WebRadar logs information in the SystemOut.log and SystemErr.log files located in wp_profile/logs/YOUR_SERVER, where YOUR_SERVER is the server WebRadar is running on.
